events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
Agent John has been assigned to handle the refund request for the order placed by the customer.
Hello, I’m John from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue?
My order number is 12345AB and I’ve attached the photo showing the wrong product that was sent instead.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the money back on your payment method within 5 business days.
Thank you, I appreciate your quick response and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund request has been finalized and confirmed. The case is now resolved from our side.
We’re checking in to make sure your refund has been received and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
As there are no further concerns, we are closing this case. Please contact us again if you need any further assistance.
